DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine bioequivalence Alendronate Sodium 70 mg Dr. Reddy 's Fosamax Tablets 70 mg Merck & Co .
DOC.brief_title: Bioequivalence Study Alendronate Sodium Tablets 70 mg Dr. Reddy 's Under Fasting Conditions
DOC.detailed_description: Open label , balance , randomize , two-treatment , two-sequence , two-period , single-dose , crossover oral bioequivalence study Alendronate sodium 70 mg tablet Dr Reddy 's Laboratories Limited , India FosamaxÂ® tablet Merck & Co. , Inc. , USA , healthy , adult , human subject fast condition .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Healthy human subject age 18 45 year ( include ) . 2 . Subjects BMI 18.5 24.9 Kg/m2 weight less 45 Kgs . 3 . Female subject postmenopausal surgically sterile . 4 . Female subject child bear potential practicing acceptable method birth control duration study judge investigator ( ) , condom , foam , jelly , diaphragm , intrauterine device ( IUD ) abstinence . 5 . Subjects normal health determine personal medical history , clinical examination , laboratory examination serology test . 6 . Subjects normal 12lead electrocardiogram ( ECG ) . 7 . Subjects normal chest XRay ( P/A view ) . 8 . Subjects able communicate effectively . 9 . Subjects willing give write informed consent adhere requirement protocol . 1 . Subjects contraindication hypersensitivity Alendronate sodium relate drug . 2 . History presence medical condition disease accord opinion physician . 3 . History presence significant alcoholism drug abuse past one year . 5 . History presence significant smoking ( 10 cigarette beedi's/day consumption tobacco product ) . 6 . Pulse rate le 50/minute 100/minute . 11 . Use prescribed medication last two week OTC medical product last one week precede first dosing . 12 . Major illness 3 month screen . 13 . Participation drug research study within past 3 month . 14 . Donation blood past 3 month screen . 15 . Female volunteer demonstrate positive pregnancy screen . 16 .
